title: Chocolate Bread
description: A delicious, soft, and slightly sweet treat made with rich cocoa
instructions: Step 1. In a large mixing bowl, add flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugars. Stir briefly.
Step 2. In a medium bowl, add melted butter, eggs and vanilla. Stir with a fork to break up the egg yolks.
Step 3. Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients, along with the buttermilk.
Step 4. : Gently stir until combined. Stir through chocolate chips.

title: Lasagna
description: A rich, hearty and cheesy italian dish
instructions: Step 1. Boil pasta in a large pot of salted water boil lasagna noodles per the recipe below.
Step 2. Prepare meat sauce add the beef with onion and garlic. Drain well, add the pasta sauce
